name: Mordekaiser
subtitle: the Iron Revenant
description: Twice slain and thrice born, Mordekaiser is a brutal warlord from a foregone epoch who uses his necromantic sorcery to bind souls into an eternity of servitude. Few now remain who remember his earlier conquests, or know the true extent of his powers—but there are some ancient souls that do, and they fear the day when he may return to claim dominion over both the living and the dead.

abilities.name: Darkness Rise
abilities.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

abilities.name: Obliterate
abilities.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

abilities.name: Indestructible
abilities.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

abilities.name: Death's Grasp
abilities.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
